content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) connected to a wooden chest at position (41.5, -80.5) and a stone furnace at position (43.0, -82.0).
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) for storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) for processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) for transferring items into the stone furnace.

### Iron Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) connected to a wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) and a stone furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0).
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) for storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) for processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) for transferring items into the stone furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into furnaces or other entities.

### Warnings regarding full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests at drop positions to prevent mining drills from halting operations due to full storage.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
